website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need a 13-inch portable or a 15-inch workhorse, the Dell Inspiron 7000 2-in-1 offers unheard-of value for money. You can invest in an external battery pack to extend its battery life.
pros: The Dell Inspiron 7000 2-in-1 comes with all the trimmings -- a slim metal chassis, backflipping touchscreen, speedy solid state drive and accurate touchpad -- for hundreds less than you'd expect
A face-recognizing camera, rare for any laptop, is icing on the cake
cons: The glossy touchscreen creates distracting reflections, and a poorly-placed power button is easy to press by accident
Uninspired design, heavier than competing laptops and battery life is slightly below average

customer_reviews.title: Great computer despite the speakers
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great computer for the price. Light, durable with all the modern features I wanted (SSD, USB C, etc). Only two complaints, out of the box the colors are terrible, but are easily fixed by tinkering with the display settings on the graphics card software. The speakers are also nearly useless. Everything sounds tinny and underwater. I wouldn't use this for music or movies without external speakers. I bought this for work, so it's not a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read many good and bad reviews and still decided to buy a ...
customer_reviews.text: Read many good and bad reviews and still decided to buy a refurbished one. One thing is for certain, it is very quiet, as quiet as my cell phone. There isn't any fan or hard drive noise at all. Battery life is much better than expected, about six hours of streaming video or constant use. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Rogers

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased two of these lap tops and mine is great the other exact same computer is having issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these lap tops and mine is great the other exact same computer is having issues with screen that is jumping and going in and out of image... have shut it down and restarted it but there is still a hint of screen jumping .. not happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton Bombdog Horseman

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like one day opening your laptop and having screws fall out of it
customer_reviews.text: So after less than 2 years of purchasing this laptop, one day I open the laptop and seeing screws just fall out of the machine. The lid of the screen is visibly falling apart from the pics. This is separate from the HINGE issue that a lot of other users are facing. I've never seen any sort of malfunction like this and Dell certainly won't fix it for free, claiming it is a 'wear and tear' issue. Absolutely ridiculous, Dell used to have great laptop products. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney K

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine. A little heavy to be truly portable but the 2-1 feature is nice. Computer is responsive and pretty fast. I would use it for non graphic intensive games but for everyday use and videos it's a great deal. I use it with external monitors and the usb-c port allows for an extra video signal. Couple that with the HDMI and the actual laptop screen you can have three screens running simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: WEDisney

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This 2-in-1 meets all my expectations and more! I wasn't sure if I would like or even use the touch screen, but it is great to have at times. Lightening quick and easy to use...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful computer. Great buy. Saved money. We shopped around and this was the best deal. Packaged great. Came fast. Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very good laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Got laptop last weekend. Test run on several websites for speed and connectivity (compare to my old laptop). Very fast and responsive. Touch screen is nice. Very sturdy built. FYI, need to get screen protector to keep finger print off screen, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbend

customer_reviews.title: Good looking outside
customer_reviews.text: Good looking outside. It runs fast, better than i3 which is really slow. Battery is about 6hrs. If running web, typing word, doing programming without charge, it will take about 4hrs. Perfect for watching video, working. Easy to carry, it's light, thin. I did try another one with i7 refurbished, 4k, it stopped running suddently. Recommend this one after trying i3 and i7 refurbished on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: PHONG NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead,  no help
customer_reviews.text: Battery dead just outside the 1yr warranty. No help from Dell. Im so tried if buying cheap overpriced products. Sigh
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Weird Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice computer if you can adjust to the keyboard. I like the fact it is back-lit. I don't like the spacing of the keyboard. Clear pictures and sound. Light and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: zesty

customer_reviews.title: As promised and described.
customer_reviews.text: This configuration is great. Fast boot up, great WiFi and Bluetooth coverage, and a nice screen and decent keyboard. The 2in1 thing is OK for me, but I mostly use it as a laptop. That said, on the few occasions I've flipped it around for a slideshow or as a tent to watch a movie, it worked great...I would dare say better than my surface. The only downside to this Dell is the placement of the power button. It's right where you want to grab the device when you pick it up so I've inadvertently turned it off/on when I hadn't intended to. Given Dell's recent track record of snafus..I'll give them a pass since everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: but the quality is awesome ("is that IPS
customer_reviews.text: It took me a week to find a balance between screen quality, performance, hardware performance, and price. Found it, it is mine. I did not test 4k monitor, but the quality is awesome ("is that IPS, it looks like IPS"). One of the best I have seen. CPU and GPR run fast, games included. Battery life 3-4 hours Strong aliminum body!! Have fun =) No DVD. No secondary drive.
customer_reviews.author: rathernot

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Its good I bought it to gift someone... but it's way to heavy
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Zafar

customer_reviews.title: An excellent professional laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's fast, it's beautiful, the keyboard is backlit. The screen is bright and clear.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Puked at two months Dell will not BACK product
customer_reviews.text: Computer stopped functioning at two months! Dell will not replace/refund. Dell says it may troubleshoot and fix with "refurbished" parts! $900 and Dell and seller fail to support product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a computer that I do not have any frustrations over
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine for the $
customer_reviews.text: Speedy machine, fairly lightweight, nice touchscreen, good size screen. Miss the 9 key pad but not a dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Friederick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product at amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Good hardware build quality. Runs all the programs, videos. Browsing in multiple tabs is also smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: ... and trouble free experience definitely would buy from again Great computer and a great
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and trouble free experience definitely would buy from again Great computer and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Lake -life24/7

customer_reviews.title: Bad computer
customer_reviews.text: Never functioned well since I bought it so I would avoid this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent service and delivered as promised and happy with the computer
customer_reviews.author: SADACK TOOTLA

customer_reviews.title: All around a great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Screen, speed, elegance, versatility and light. All around a great laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love everything but the power button :)
customer_reviews.text: As the title said, I love everything about this laptop so far since I have it for a couple of month now. I use this for work, and personal video editing. It works well with all the program I have downloaded. Only one thing I wish they could move the power button to somewhere else instead of the corner right bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Vongthanousinh Manoroth

customer_reviews.title: I loved this computer
customer_reviews.text: I loved this computer. perfect design, real beauty. However, i think the manufactury needs to work on technical part. I opend the package and I realized the battery doesnt work. I called Dell, I spent around 3 hours of my time to run different tests, after runing the last test ,they said I have to change the battery. but i paid for new ,not a refurbish item. therefore I just return it to Amazon. so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Zahra

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Computer came with hardware issue - the webcam did not work. Dell asked me to perform a million updates and run a billion tests. They determined it needed to be sent in to be fixed. Would take 7-12 business days to fix. I returned to Amazon. I don't want to deal with a broken on arrival machine.
customer_reviews.author: Yup I bought it

customer_reviews.title: Good solidly built machine with good specs for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality, very capable machine for the price. I work for a software company and have access to pretty good tech. For a consumer grade laptop under $1000, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I just received this gorgeous laptop a few days ago and so far so good. It is slimmer than I thought and feels great. Its the feeling of good quality :-) I love the tablet option. It is super fast and streams very well. The only issue that I have is that it shows its not connected to Wi-Fi but it actually is. Not a big deal for me. I bought it because I needed a new laptop for school and I was concerned about the price but I am extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it gets stuck and wont shut down until i remove the battery manually
customer_reviews.author: A. Helmi

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Power button not worked properly, everything else works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't adjust sound, couldn't click on minimized tabs... tech support couldn't help.. returned labtop. What a joke.. got a Lenovo yoga instead hoping I have better luck
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gulati

customer_reviews.title: 6" FHD This computer is fine in every aspect except one
customer_reviews.text: Dell Inspiron 15 7000 2-in-1 7579 - 15.6" FHD This computer is fine in every aspect except one. No disc drive for loading software or playing dvd's. I purchased it as a gift for my Grandson who is an avid gamer. He is headed to college in the Fall and needed a new computer. We will see. David Allen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a number pad. Therefore, did not like it. Didn't notice that when I bought it. Also, didn't think the screen was super clear, and the audio was also not super clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No 10 key pad
customer_reviews.text: Hard to see that no 10 key in photos. If you are used to using a 10 key this computers is not for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 15 7000 2-in-1 I7579-0028GRY - 15.6" FHD Touch - 7th Gen i5-7200U - 8GB - 256GB SSD - Gray
product_meta.description: Capacity:i5-7200U | 8GB RAM | 256GB SSD | Windows 10Dell Inspiron Convertible 2-in-1 Laptop: Stay connected to social media with this 15-inch Dell Inspiron Starlord laptop. The Intel Core processor keeps the computer responsive, and 1080p touch screen makes it easy to use the laptop once it's converted to a tablet. An infrared camera on this Dell Inspiron Starlord laptop enhances functionality and supports bio security.
feature_bullets: Windows 10 Home; 7th Gen Intel® Core i5 processor; 15.6" display; 8GB memory; 256GB solid state drive; Bluetooth; touch screen; backlit keyboard; HDMI output; DVD/CD drive not included
